description:
[h2]Recommended Mods[/h2]
[list]
[*][b][url=https://github.com/QuestionableM/SM-CustomAudioExtension#readme]SM-DLM[/url][/b] by [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/QuestionMarko]Questionable Mark[/url][/b] allows you to hear new sounds that have been added to the mod
[*][b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1903792337]Machine Guns Pack[/url][/b] by [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198280635682]Driver[/url][/b] adds a variety weapons, machine guns and sights
[/list]
[hr][/hr]
[b]Join [url=https://discord.gg/vhbSdmBNKw]Tank Parts discord server[/url][/b]

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Features[/h1]
[h3]Breech[/h3]
[list]
[*]37mm M5
[*]75mm KwK 37
[*]75mm KwK 42
[*]76mm ZiS-5
[*]76mm F-34
[*]88mm KwK 36
[*]122mm D-25T
[*]152mm M-10T
[/list]
[h3]Different Shell Types[/h3]
Currently the mod has
[list]
[*][b]Armor-Piercing shells[/b]
[*][b]Armor-Piercing Composite Rigid shells[/b] - can break stronger armor, but doesn't explode and loses its penetration capacity more than AP shells
[*][b]Armor-Piercing High-Explosive shells[/b] - breaks the armor and explodes behind it. It doesn't explode if the armor were too weak
[*][b]High-Explosive shells[/b] - explodes at any hit and throws a lot of shrapnel
[*][b]High-Explosive Anti-Tank shells[/b] - Does not lose penetration capacity with distance, but lose 10 of it for each air block behind the target
[/list]
[h3]Advanced Penetration Simulation[/h3]
Shells have penetration capacity. The higher this value, the bigger sum of the blocks durability the shell can break
[h3]Different Shells Strength[/h3]
Each breech has different shells strength. For example, KwK 42 is stronger than F-34
[h3]More Interactive Parts[/h3]
[list]
[*][b]Turret Steer[/b] - connect it to bearings to rotate them with A and D. You can adjust the speed with 1 and 2
[*][b]Periscope[/b] - connect it to a viewport and look from behind the walls. Connect it to bearings to turn your viewport with WASD
[*][b]More[/b] you will find in the game!
[/list]
[hr][/hr]
[h1]Credits[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]Special thanks[/b] to [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Red-Builds]The Red Builder[/url][/b] for helping with SM modding!
[*][b]Thanks[/b] to [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198280635682]Driver[/url][/b] for helping with animations
[/list]
name: Tank Parts
